caption.p: Comparative analysis of the cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 DNA barcode sequences between Protaetia brevitarsis (PB) samples and Protaetia species registered in GenBank. Dots (.) and dashes (-) indicate identical nucleotides and gaps with “ P. brevitarsis #1_This study” respectively, when compared with corresponding cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 sequence of PB larvae samples used in this study, to maximize sequence alignment presentation. The boxes indicate sequences identical with that of the Protaetia brevitarsis (accession no. KC775706). Each nucleotides are marked in different colors: green, A; blue, C; red, T; black, G.
